body.name: Degree Men Antiperspirant Spray Black + White 3 Count Protects from Deodorant Stains Instantly Dry Spray Deodorant 3.8 oz

features: Degree Men UltraClear Antiperspirant Spray UltraClear Black + White, is our best deodorant stains protection against white marks on black clothes and yellow stains on white clothes
This mens spray deodorant goes on instantly dry for a cleaner, so you can quickly get moving towards your next adventure. This is one Degree's best antiperspirant for men in a dry spray formula
Unique antiperspirant MotionSense technology that keeps you fresher the more you move. It’s filled with smart capsules that respond to motion. When you move, these capsules burst with fragrance
This Degree dry spray deodorant contains a modern masculine scent built on amber and woody notes
Being the number 1 deodorant brand by volume, Degree’ best deodorant for men is known to give you the ultimate freshness that’s activated when you move, however you move
body.description: Degree UltraClear dry spray deodorant with antiperspirant 3.8 oz goes on instantly dry for a cleaner feel and is specially designed to keep your clothes looking new. This antiperspirant spray protects from deodorant stains with no white marks on black clothes and no yellow stains on white clothes. You'll look great all day. Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant UltraClear Black + White Fresh has a formula that cuts down on the stains that some antiperspirants leave behind when they mix sweat and natural oils produced by your body. This antiperspirant spray with deodorant protection contains a breakthrough MotionSense technology that'll keep you fresher with every move. Degree MotionSense technology dry spray deodorant works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules, and they release more fragrance. So, every time you move, MotionSense keeps you fresh and free from odor. This powerful antiperspirant spray deodorant responds to movement so that you can stay confident without having to worry about slowing down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stay fresh with Degree Men UltraClear Black+White Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray. This antiperspirant combats stains and provides 72-hour sweat and odor protection with a cedarwood, orange and pineapple scent, that will leave you feeling fresh all day.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This antiperspirant deodorant dry spray delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Works in sync with your body to release bursts of a crisp and energizing fragrance, keeping you fresh all day. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD SUSTAINABILITY Degree Dry Spray cans are made with infinitely recyclable aluminum.

Degree Men Advanced Protection Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick, 2.7 oz Degree Men Original Protection Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz Degree Men UltraClear Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz Main Benefit This men's antiperspirant deodorant has a rugged fragrance that blends clean citrus, energizing fresh pepper and long-lasting notes of woods and musk. Our Sport Antiperspirant Deodorant features our breakthrough MotionSense technology that doesn't stop working no matter how much you move. This antiperspirant deodorant provides the best protection against white marks on black clothes and yellow stains on white clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Protection Against Deodorant Stains: Degree Men Antiperspirant Spray Review
reviews.reviewText: One of the primary reasons I chose this deodorant was its promise to protect against deodorant stains on black and white clothing. I'm pleased to report that it lives up to its claims. After weeks of use, I've noticed a significant reduction in unsightly deodorant marks on my shirts. This feature alone makes it a standout product.The "instant dry" claim is not an exaggeration. The spray goes on and dries almost immediately, leaving me feeling fresh without any sticky residue. This quick-dry feature is perfect for those busy mornings when I'm in a rush.Degree Men Antiperspirant Spray effectively keeps me feeling dry and smelling fresh throughout the day. It provides reliable sweat and odor protection, which is especially important during hot and active days.While the scent is pleasant and not overpowering, it's worth noting that scent preferences can vary widely among individuals. I would appreciate more variety in the available scents to cater to different preferences.Degree Men Antiperspirant Spray Black + White in a pack of three is a reliable choice for anyone seeking effective protection against deodorant stains and long-lasting sweat and odor control. Its instant dry formula is a game-changer for busy individuals, and the compact packaging makes it suitable for everyday use and travel. While the scent is pleasant, offering more fragrance options would be a welcome improvement. If you're tired of dealing with deodorant stains on your clothing and want a deodorant that delivers on its promises, I highly recommend giving this product a try. It has become a staple in my daily routine, providing the protection and confidence I need to tackle the day ahead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My deodorant of choice
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this particular product for a couple of years and it is my favorite. I have a physical job and I sweat a lot. Stick deodorants are out because I get a rash from them.Plus: decent price for a 3 pack, lasts through a 4 hour shift and most of the day after work, aerosol spray, non-sticky.Minus: not even close to 72 hour life, aerosol spray not enviro-friendly, price, does leave yellow stains on whites after a several uses (I wear white T's on an exercise bike and they get soaked during the workout then I hang on a hangar to dry before they get washed)Bottom line, convenient, effective odor control, 3 pack saves trips (I don't go through it fast enough to warrant making it a periodic delivery).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this deodorant. It's effective and l have been using it for the past three years. The price is right and I highly recommend it to all. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job without the mess
reviews.reviewText: Shirt stains and heavy sweating have always been a problem for me. So I apply more deodorant/antiperspirant than most people. This causes my shirts to be stained by the white chalky stuff that normal for deodorant bars. I’d tried gel in the past and found that they didn’t perform as well. So when I heard about this I was very skeptical. I tried it and not only does it not stain my shirts but it actually keeps me dry. I’ve even had shirts that I thought were ruined eventually wash old stains out to where they are useable again. Super impressed with this product and will be using it exclusively in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Favorite deodorant for sweat and smell, put on the night before after a shower and all good throughout the next day.
